fruits.name: Apple
fruits.description: Apples are a good source of antioxidants, fiber, water, and several nutrients.

fruits.name: Banana
fruits.description: Bananas are a popular fruit with many potential health benefits. They may boost your digestion and heart health thanks to their fiber and antioxidant contents.

fruits.name: Orange
fruits.description: Oranges are among the world's most popular fruits, as they're both tasty and nutritious. They are a good source of vitamin C
